Smiles for all ages!

Damon Smile is based on a unique treatment philosophy that goes beyond a beautiful smile. We are trained to consider the whole patient: the shape of your face, your profile, and what you will look like into your 40s, 50s, and beyond.

Damon Smile Bracelift

In addition to straight teeth, adults who use Damon Smile may notice:

  • A fuller, wider smile
  • Balanced facial aesthetics
  • Smoother cheek contours
  • Fewer dark triangles within the corners of the mouth
